parameters.name: ApplicationIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the applications that the EIAM organization can access. You can query a maximum of 100 application IDs at a time.

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitId
parameters.description: The ID of the EIAM organization.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
